places.name: Ooty
places.description: Ooty is a serene hill station in Tamil Nadu known for tea gardens and misty mountains.
places.travel: By flight (nearest Coimbatore 85 km), by train (toy train from Mettupalayam), by bus or car via Nilgiri Hills.

places.name: Munnar
places.description: Munnar, located in Kerala, is known for its lush tea gardens, waterfalls, and cool climate.
places.travel: By flight (nearest Kochi 110 km), by train (Aluva), by bus from Kochi or by car via Western Ghats.

places.name: Manali
places.description: Manali is a picturesque hill station in Himachal Pradesh surrounded by snow-capped mountains.
places.travel: By flight (Bhuntar 50 km), by train (Joginder Nagar), by bus from Delhi or by car through Kullu Valley.

places.name: Shimla
places.description: Shimla, the capital of Himachal Pradesh, is famous for colonial architecture and Himalayan views.
places.travel: By flight (Jubbarhatti 22 km), by train (Kalka-Shimla toy train), by bus or car from Chandigarh.

places.name: Darjeeling
places.description: Darjeeling, in West Bengal, is known for its tea estates, Toy Train, and the stunning view of Kanchenjunga.
places.travel: By flight (Bagdogra 70 km), by train (New Jalpaiguri), by car or shared jeep via Siliguri.

places.name: Kerala
places.description: Kerala, known as God's Own Country, is famous for its backwaters, beaches, and greenery.
places.travel: By flight (Cochin, Trivandrum, Calicut airports), by train (connected to major cities), by road or houseboat.
